text: just after the ending of the fireworks
all the people were on the beach I was
among of them enjoying the fireworks of
the celebration of the National Day of
France and just like five minutes after
ending it all the people were just
moving again in the middle street in
front of the beach and suddenly we hear
screaming loudly and I saw a truck
coming towards me I was just in front of
the truck and but in the main street me
and some other people around me and I
saw some people under the fact match it
already so he just stopped in front of
me like one meter one and a half meter I
could see him through the window and
what I thought at the beginning me and
the people are around that it's an
accident and he just lost the control of
the car and he hit the people by by
accident so I kept yelling at him and
shouting to him so stop stop because
there is people under under the truck
but he was not looking at anyone he was
just moving inside the car in a very
nervous aggressively way like if he's
some searching for something and his
hands were up the wheels I thought like
with I thought like he lost the control
and he's trying to stop the car but he
picked up something I think it looks it
looked to me like a cell phone so again
I thought maybe he's trying to call the
ambulance
and suddenly I the police were coming
from behind me because I was just facing
him and I saw him taking out his gun and
starting to shoot through the window and
at that moment the police pushed me away
asking to run
just keeping saying in French diga diga
je so I stepped back like four meters
and at that moment I just picked up my
cell phone and I started to video the
shooting and what's going on I didn't
run I was just frozen and I filmed
everything till he is killed till the
police killed him
and again the officer saw me filming he
came to me aggressively screaming
yelling at me to run and I just get down
because they were saying get down get
down because of the bullets and the
shooting so I went down on the floor but
I was still filming and when he saw me
again he came just write to me and
yelling at me to run away or me and all
the people on the beach because I
believed it he thought maybe he he could
have a bomb in the car and he could
explode himself or even the car could
explode so in that moment I realized
that really it's really serious and I
started to run with the people on the
beach
